scopes.ZohoCreator.meta.application.READ: Get forms, reports in an application.
scopes.ZohoCreator.report.READ: Get records and download file in a report.
scopes.ZohoCreator.meta.form.READ: Get list of fields in a form.

info.description: Zoho Creator provides RESTful APIs that allow you to securely interface with your Zoho Creator applications and perform a variety of tasks.
info.title: Zoho Creator API v2 conforming OpenAPI Specification

tags.name: Data APIs
tags.description: APIs to add, update, delete or get records in a form/report

tags.name: Publish APIs
tags.description: APIs to add or get records in a published form/report

tags.name: File APIs
tags.description: APIs to upload or download files in a report

tags.name: Meta APIs
tags.description: Get list of applications, forms, reports and fields

tags.name: Bulk Read APIs
tags.description: APIs to fetch a large set of data in a report
